medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive movement disorder characterized by severe generalized dystonia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 28 years ago with abnormal neck movements, progressing to facial and limb involvement. The patient has become wheelchair bound and is completely dependent for activities of daily living.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of sporadic dystonia musculorum deformans diagnosed in 1993. Previous treatments included levodopa and anticholinergic drugs with unsuccessful outcomes, as well as botulinum toxin injections resulting in partial improvement.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of similar symptoms; the patient's parents are first cousins.
